Module com.example.towersofhanoi

Package com.example.towersofhanoi.Controller

package com.example.towersofhanoi.Controller
This package contains the "Controller" classes for the Towers of Hanoi game. The controller classes contain the view logic and define how information is displayed and interacted with
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.towersofhanoi
     
    com.example.towersofhanoi.Model
    This package contains the "Model" classes for the Towers of Hanoi game.
    com.example.towersofhanoi.View
    This package contains the "View" classes for the Towers of Hanoi game.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ComputerSolvedController
    The ComputerSolvedController class is responsible for displaying the computer's solution statistics.
    LogInController
    The LogInController class is responsible for controlling the login screen.
    MenuController
    The MenuController class is responsible for controlling the main menu screen.
    OptionsController
    The OptionsController class is responsible for controlling the options screen.
    PlayController
    The PlayController class is responsible for controlling the gameplay screen.
    SettingsController
    The SettingsController class is responsible for controlling the user's account information.
    SignUpController
    The SignUpController class handles the functionality of the sign-up view in the Towers of Hanoi application.
    StatisticsController
    The StatisticsController class handles the functionality of the statistics view in the Towers of Hanoi application.
    TutorialController
    The TutorialController class handles the functionality of the automatic game in the Towers of Hanoi application.
    UserSolvedController
    The UserSolvedController class handles the functionality of the user solved view in the Towers of Hanoi application.
